author: rjung
msg: Allow to release from a tag that does not
conform to the format JK_MAJOR_MIDDLE_MINOR.
- changed version number flag from "-t" to "-v".
This is the version that is used inside the
tarball name etc.
By default it is also used to retrieve from
the right tag.
- new optional flag "-t" allows to additionally
provide the name of a non-standard tag from
which to roll the version.
Example: -v 1.2.31 -t JK_1_2_31_RC_1
The given tag is checked, whether it is equal to
the default tag plus suffix. If not the script
barks. If you are sure about using a really
strange tag, force with "-f".
